value.name: Part of Clays Mill Road is about to be shut down for months. Find out where and why.
value.description: Charles Bertram cbertram@herald-leader.com Beginning Sunday and throughout the summer, part of Clays Mill Road will be closed as the city continues a widening project that began 10 years ago.
